title: Submit a Grant Proposal
description: A researcher needs assistance with the final submission of a federal grant proposal through the university's sponsored programs office.

tasks.description: Identify the researcher and the grant proposal details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the pending proposal in the administration system.

tasks.description: Perform a final review of the proposal against the funding agency's requirements checklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that all required sections and signatures are present.

tasks.description: Officially submit the grant proposal through the federal government's online portal on behalf of the university.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the proposal and logs the confirmation number.
